attributes.action: make it a criminal offence to park a vehicle in a disabled bay without a blue badge on both public and private land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often, people are parking on disabled bays with no badge displayed, doing so because they are usually closest to retail outlets. If anyone complains to the retail outlet excuses are usually made not to take action, often claiming it's the responsibility of the landlord. People know they can do this without penalty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
